response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the countertop without any errors. The next step is to grasp the box of chocolates.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the countertop.
(2) Grasp the box of chocolates.
(3) Put the box of chocolates in the sack.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Grasp the box of chocolates
    box_of_chocolates = registry(env, "box_of_chocolates_91")
    EasyGrasp(robot, box_of_chocolates)
    donothing(env)
